data.eml:eml: First Iranian species of Neosilphitrombium (Acari: Prostigmata: Neothrombiidae) with a key to world species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saboori, Alireza, Hajiqanbar, Hamidreza, Hakimitabar, Masoud (2011): First Iranian species of Neosilphitrombium (Acari: Prostigmata: Neothrombiidae) with a key to world species. Zootaxa 2738: 60-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207569
